example2.cpp

00001 //
00002 // C++ Implementation: example3
00003 //
00004 // Description: Draws the famous 'tiger' picture from OpenVG Reference Implementation (khronos.org)
00005 //
00006 //
00007 // Author: Marian Krivos <nezmar@tutok.sk>, (C) 2007
00008 //
00009 // Copyright: See COPYING file that comes with this distribution
00010 //
00011 //
00012 #include <stdio.h>
00013 #include <stdlib.h>
00014 #include <assert.h>
00015 #include <string.h>
00016 
00017 #include "vgEngine.h"
00018 #include "vgBitmapFile.h"
00019 
00020 #include "tiger.h"
00021 
00022 /*--------------------------------------------------------------*/
00023 
00024 float               pixelScale = 1.f;
00025 float               aspectRatio;
00026 int                 initialWidth;
00027 int                 initialHeight;
00028 float               mousex, mousey;
00029 int                 mouseButton = 0;
00030 int                 window;
00031 
00032 VGBitmapFile bmp;
00033 VGContext context;

00035 /*--------------------------------------------------------------*/
00036 
00037 typedef struct
00038 {
00039     VGFillRule      m_fillRule;
00040     VGPaintMode     m_paintMode;
00041     VGCapStyle      m_capStyle;
00042     VGJoinStyle     m_joinStyle;
00043     float           m_miterLimit;
00044     float           m_strokeWidth;
00045     unsigned char   m_strokePaint[4];
00046     unsigned char   m_fillPaint[4];
00047     VGPath          m_path;
00048 } PathData;
00049 
00050 typedef struct
00051 {
00052     PathData*           m_paths;
00053     int                 m_numPaths;
00054 } PS;
00055 
00056 PS* PS_construct(const char* commands, int commandCount, const float* points, int pointCount)
00057 {
00058     PS* ps = (PS*)malloc(sizeof(PS));
00059     int p = 0;
00060     int c = 0;
00061     int i = 0;
00062     int paths = 0;
00063     int maxElements = 0;
00064 
00065     while(c < commandCount)
00066     {
00067         int elements, e;
00068         c += 4;
00069         p += 8;
00070         elements = (int)points[p++];
00071         assert(elements > 0);
00072         if(elements > maxElements)
00073             maxElements = elements;
00074         for(e=0;e<elements;e++)
00075         {
00076             switch(commands[c])
00077             {
00078             case 'M': p += 2; break;
00079             case 'L': p += 2; break;
00080             case 'C': p += 6; break;
00081             case 'E': break;
00082             default:
00083                 break;
00084 //              assert(0);      //unknown command
00085             }
00086             c++;
00087         }
00088         paths++;
00089     }
00090 
00091     ps->m_numPaths = paths;
00092     ps->m_paths = (PathData*)malloc(paths * sizeof(PathData));
00093 
00094     i = 0;
00095     p = 0;
00096     c = 0;
00097     while(c < commandCount)
00098     {
00099         int elements, startp, e;
00100         VGPath path;
00101         int debug = 1;
00102                 
00103         //fill type
00104         int paintMode = 0;
00105         ps->m_paths[i].m_fillRule = VG_NON_ZERO;
00106         switch( commands[c] )
00107         {
00108         case 'N':
00109             break;
00110         case 'F':
00111             ps->m_paths[i].m_fillRule = VG_NON_ZERO;
00112             paintMode |= VG_FILL_PATH;
00113             break;
00114         case 'E':
00115             ps->m_paths[i].m_fillRule = VG_EVEN_ODD;
00116             paintMode |= VG_FILL_PATH;
00117             break;
00118         default:
00119             break;
00120         }
00121         c++;
00122 
00123         //stroke
00124         switch( commands[c] )
00125         {
00126         case 'N':
00127             if (debug) printf("FILL ");
00128             break;
00129         case 'S':
00130             paintMode |= VG_STROKE_PATH;
00131             if (debug) printf("FILL+STROKE ");
00132             break;
00133         default:
00134             break;      //unknown command
00135         }
00136         ps->m_paths[i].m_paintMode = (VGPaintMode)paintMode;
00137         c++;
00138 
00139         //line cap
00140         switch( commands[c] )
00141         {
00142         case 'B':
00143             ps->m_paths[i].m_capStyle = VG_CAP_BUTT;
00144             break;
00145         case 'R':
00146             ps->m_paths[i].m_capStyle = VG_CAP_ROUND;
00147             break;
00148         case 'S':
00149             ps->m_paths[i].m_capStyle = VG_CAP_SQUARE;
00150             break;
00151         default:
00152             break;
00153         }
00154         c++;
00155 
00156         //line join
00157         switch( commands[c] )
00158         {
00159         case 'M':
00160             ps->m_paths[i].m_joinStyle = VG_JOIN_MITER;
00161             break;
00162         case 'R':
00163             ps->m_paths[i].m_joinStyle = VG_JOIN_ROUND;
00164             break;
00165         case 'B':
00166             ps->m_paths[i].m_joinStyle = VG_JOIN_BEVEL;
00167             break;
00168         default:
00169             break;
00170         }
00171         c++;
00172 
00173         //the rest of stroke attributes
00174         ps->m_paths[i].m_miterLimit = points[p++];
00175         ps->m_paths[i].m_strokeWidth = points[p++];
00176 
00177         ps->m_paths[i].m_strokePaint[0] = (unsigned char)(points[p++] * 255);
00178         ps->m_paths[i].m_strokePaint[1] = (unsigned char)(points[p++] * 255);
00179         ps->m_paths[i].m_strokePaint[2] = (unsigned char)(points[p++] * 255);
00180         ps->m_paths[i].m_strokePaint[3] = 255;
00181 
00182         ps->m_paths[i].m_fillPaint[0] = (unsigned char)(points[p++] * 255);
00183         ps->m_paths[i].m_fillPaint[1] = (unsigned char)(points[p++] * 255);
00184         ps->m_paths[i].m_fillPaint[2] = (unsigned char)(points[p++] * 255);
00185         ps->m_paths[i].m_fillPaint[3] = 255;
00186 
00187         //read number of elements
00188 
00189         elements = (int)points[p++];
00190         assert(elements > 0);
00191         startp = p;
00192         const float* r = points+startp;
00193         
00194         path = ps->m_paths[i].m_path = vgCreatePath();
00195         
00196         for(e=0;e<elements;e++)
00197         {
00198             switch( commands[c] )
00199             {
00200             case 'M':
00201                 if (debug) printf("vgMoveTo(path, %f, %f );\n", r[0], r[1]);  
00202                 vgMoveTo(path, r[0], r[1]);
00203                 p += 2;
00204                 r += 2;
00205                 break;
00206             case 'L':
00207                 if (debug) printf("vgLineTo(path, %f, %f );\n", r[0], r[1]);
00208                 vgLineTo(path, r[0], r[1]);
00209                 p += 2;
00210                 r += 2;
00211                 break;
00212             case 'C':
00213                 if (debug) printf("vgCubicTo(path, %f, %f, %f, %f, %f, %f );\n", r[0], r[1], r[2], r[3], r[4], r[5]);
00214                 vgCubicTo(path, r[0], r[1], r[2], r[3], r[4], r[5]);
00215                 r += 6;
00216                 p += 6;
00217                 break;
00218             case 'E':
00219                 vgClosePath(path);
00220                 if (debug) printf("vgClosePath(path);\n");
00221                 break;
00222             default:
00223                 break;
00224             }
00225             c++;
00226         }
00227         i++;
00228     }
00229     return ps;
00230 }
00231 
00232 void PS_destruct(PS* ps)
00233 {
00234     int i;
00235     assert(ps);
00236     for(i=0;i<ps->m_numPaths;i++)
00237     {
00238         vgDestroyPath(ps->m_paths[i].m_path);
00239     }
00240     free(ps->m_paths);
00241     free(ps);
00242 }
00243 
00244 void PS_render(PS* ps)
00245 {
00246     int i;
00247     assert(ps);
00248 //  vgSeti(VG_BLEND_MODE, VG_BLEND_SRC_OVER);
00249 
00250     for(i=0;i<ps->m_numPaths;i++)
00251     {
00252         vgFillRule(context, ps->m_paths[i].m_fillRule);
00253         vgFillColor(context, ps->m_paths[i].m_fillPaint[0], ps->m_paths[i].m_fillPaint[1], ps->m_paths[i].m_fillPaint[2], 255);
00254 
00255         if(ps->m_paths[i].m_paintMode & VG_STROKE_PATH)
00256         {
00257             vgLineWidth(context, ps->m_paths[i].m_strokeWidth);
00258             vgLineCapStyle(context, ps->m_paths[i].m_capStyle);
00259             vgLineJoinStyle(context, ps->m_paths[i].m_joinStyle);
00260             vgLineMiter(context, ps->m_paths[i].m_miterLimit);
00261             vgLineColor(context, ps->m_paths[i].m_strokePaint[0], ps->m_paths[i].m_strokePaint[1], ps->m_paths[i].m_strokePaint[2], 255);
00262         }
00263 
00264         vgDrawPath(context, ps->m_paths[i].m_path, ps->m_paths[i].m_paintMode);
00265     }
00266     assert(vgGetError(context) == VG_NO_ERROR);
00267 }
00268 
00269 PS* tiger = NULL;
00270 
00271 /*--------------------------------------------------------------*/
00272 
00273 int main(void)
00274 {
00275     aspectRatio = 1; (tigerMaxY - tigerMinY) / (tigerMaxX - tigerMinX);
00276     initialWidth = 1280;
00277     initialHeight = 1024;
00278 
00279     bmp = vgCreateBitmapFile(initialWidth,initialHeight);
00280     context = vgCreateContext( initialWidth, initialHeight, vgGetBitmapFileFormat(bmp), vgGetBitmapFileRawData(bmp) );
00281     
00282     tiger = PS_construct(tigerCommands, tigerCommandCount, tigerPoints, tigerPointCount);
00283 
00284     int w = initialWidth;
00285     int h = initialHeight;
00286     
00287     float scale = 1; // w / (tigerMaxX - tigerMinX);
00288 
00289     vgClearColor(context, 255, 255, 255, 255);
00290     vgClear(context);
00291 
00292     vgLoadIdentity(context);
00293     vgScale(context, scale, scale);
00294     vgTranslate(context, -tigerMinX, -tigerMinY + 0.5f * (h / scale - (tigerMaxY - tigerMinY)));
00295 
00296     PS_render(tiger);
00297     
00298     vgSaveBitmapFile(bmp, "tiger.bmp");
00299     
00300     vgDestroyContext(context);
00301     vgDestroyBitmapFile( bmp );
00302     return 0;
00303 }
